Update: After 5 hours Heritrix suddenly woke up and wrote ONE line to crawl=
.log. At that time the web interface became responsive again and I was able=
 to get a threads report (below). It looks like everything is waiting on th=
reads 2 and 3, but I can't figure out why they are waiting. 

Interestingly=
 (to me) thread 2 is "WAITING" on "NONE".

After another 15 minutes, someth=
ing got unclogged and things are running as normal again.

heritrix_out.log=
 has nothing interesting to say during this lapse:

12/28/2012 15:31:48 +00=
00 INFO org.archive.crawler.postprocessor.LinksScoper outOfScope http://has=
brouck.asu.edu/symbiota/portal/images/layout/defaultrightstrip.gif
12/28/20=
12 20:40:44 +0000 INFO org.archive.crawler.postprocessor.LinksScoper outOfS=
cope http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/indicator.gif
12/28/2012 20:51:13 +00=
00 INFO org.archive.crawler.postprocessor.LinksScoper outOfScope http://www=
.amazon.com/musical-instruments-accessories-sound-recording/b?ie=3DUTF8&nod=
e=3D11091801
12/28/2012 20:51:13 +0000 INFO org.archive.crawler.postprocess=
or.LinksScoper outOfScope http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=3DTempl=
ate:Coord/dec2dms&action=3Dedit


Hints?? Appreciated!

(The 85 New Alerts =
are mostly java.nio.charset.IllegalCharsetNameException dating back to Dec =
24.)

From: Marvin Simkin
Sent:=
 Friday, December 28, 2012 09:50
To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
Subjec=
t: heritrix/2.0.2 freezing

Hi everyone. I've been away from Heritrix for a=
 couple years but just got asked to run it again against our web. I launche=
d it with just over 51,000 seeds, all of them using http (not https). It ra=
n fine for a few days but now it is freezing for long periods of time befor=
e it starts going again. (Minutes or hours... it has currently been stuck f=
or an hour. There isn't anything specific I've done to restart it before...=
 it just mysteriously comes back to life.) I'm hoping for some ideas how to=
 debug / improve this.

I see the heritrix version 2 line seems to have bee=
n dropped (is this why?) and versions 1 and 3 are being maintained. 3 seems=
 still experimental / in progress? Do I need to redo my configs so I can sw=
itch to version 1?

Tech details (ask me what else you need)

Linux 2.6.18-=
128.1.16.el5.xs5.5.0.54xen running as a Virtual Machine

Heritrix started w=
ith JAVA_OPTS=3D"-Xmx3584M" (the most memory I could request before getting=
 errors)

JAVA_HOME=3D/usr/local/data/msimkin/java/jre1.6.0_20/

$ cat /pro=
c/swaps
Filename                                Type            Size    Use=
d    Priority
/dev/mapper/VolGroup00-LogVol01         partition       41615=
28 2754248 -1

$ df -h .
Filesystem            Size  Used Avail Use% Mounte=
d on
192.168.70.100:/vol/infosec
                      2.0T  842G  1.1T  44=
% /usr/local/data

The "top" command reports (partial output)

top - 09:16:=
21 up 143 days,  9:05,  5 users,  load average: 1.00, 1.03, 1.21
Tasks:  98=
 total,   2 running,  95 sleeping,   0 stopped,   1 zombie
Cpu(s):  0.0%us,=
  0.2%sy,  0.0%ni, 50.2%id, 49.6%wa,  0.0%hi,  0.0%si,  0.0%st
Mem:   20971=
52k total,  2088640k used,     8512k free,      336k buffers
Swap:  4161528=
k total,  2561512k used,  1600016k free,    10120k cached

  PID USER      =
PR  NI  VIRT  RES  SHR S %CPU %MEM    TIME+  COMMAND
 8150 msimkin   15   0=
 3860m 1.6g 4752 S  0.0 78.8   1235:01 java

I interpret this to mean there=
 is (virtual) memory available, and heritrix is not trying to do anything t=
hat would use CPU. So what does it want?

When frozen, crawl.log shows no n=
ew entries, nor does heritrix_out.log or any other logfiles, not even progr=
ess-statistics.log. They all stop at about the same minute and second. The =
web interface is also unresponsive, limiting diagnosis there.

runtime-erro=
rs.log shows mostly complaints about character sets, and has no entries sin=
ce 4 days ago.

About 3 minutes before the latest freeze, nonfatal-errors.l=
og shows the following burst of timeouts. (I am running with 20 threads.)

=
2012-12-28T15:28:19.419Z    -2          - http://seamonkey.ed.asu.edu/swa/d=
iscussion/message117.html LLLLL http://wings.buffalo.edu/anthropology/Docum=

ception: connect timed out: timeout set at 20000ms.
